data.name: EagleEye Scouting Buff
data.author: Xuptio
data.description: Scouting with Gimbal is instant but still need to identify targets. Appears to be a hard limit of 10km for scouting sea and 5km for groud. vec3_dist(update_get_camera_position(), hit_pos) never goes above 10km so you cant 'see' past 10km. If there is interest, I can make a mod with a smaller buff to scouting...
